item.title: Greenlanders brace for summit that could shape the Arctic's future - and their own
item.description: US Vice President JD Vance will host Danish and Greenlandic foreign ministers for talks on Wednesday.

item.title: Kneecap terrorism charge appeal case begins at High Court
item.description: The UK government is appealing the September 2025 decision to dismiss the case brought against Liam Óg Ó hAnnaidh, aka Mo Chara.

item.title: LA to open ticket draw for 2028 Olympics - with seats starting at $28
item.description: If chosen via the draw, fans will be notified via email and will be given a time slot to purchase tickets in April.

item.title: LA to open ticket draw for 2028 Olympics - with seats starting at $28
item.description: If chosen via the draw, fans will be notified via email and will be given a time slot to purchase tickets in April.

item.title: UK secures record supply of offshore wind projects
item.description: The government needs to significantly boost its capacity of offshore wind projects if it is to meet its clean power targets.
